name: Legal Services
description: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) offers citizenship, DACA renewal, family reunification, humanitarian, and deportation defense services. Legal services that IIBA provides: - Citizenship - Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) - Family Reunification - Humanitarian - Deportation - Other Services Please note that the information provided here does not constitute individualized legal advice.

howToGetIt: Immigration applications and petitions are complex, so we strongly recommend contacting one of our offices for a consultation., or visit our website for more information. To schedule an appointment or learn more, please call (415) 538-8100 ext. 206. To book an initial consultation online visit: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/oaklandlegalconsults/ To book a deportation defense appointment online visit: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/oakdeportationdefenseconsults/
